comments:
I20070417-0800

I was attempting to set a breakpoint on a line in java.io.BufferedInputStream.close

Restarting and the problem went away.
I had launched a target on 1.5 and then switched back to 1.4.
This indicates that the binary type's (java.io.BufferedInputStream) project did not exist at the time you tried to create the breakpoint.
Fixed in ToggleBreakpointAdapter. Not sure how to get a binary type in an editor that does not have a Java project... but our code did not account for a binary type in this case.
